TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ASCIIEncoding extends System.Text.Encoding
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ASCIIEncoding extends System.Text.Encoding

summary.span: 表示 Unicode 字符的 ASCII 字符编码。

span.span: Represents an ASCII character encoding of Unicode characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编码是将一组 Unicode 字符转换为一个字节序列的过程。Encoding is the process of transforming a set of Unicode characters into a sequence of bytes. 解码是将编码字节序列转换为一组 Unicode 字符的过程。Decoding is the process of transforming a sequence of encoded bytes into a set of Unicode characters. 对应于 Windows 代码页20127。 corresponds to the Windows code page 20127. 因为 ASCII 是一种7位编码，所以 ASCII 字符限制为从 U + 0000 到 U + 007F 的最低 128 Unicode 字符。Because ASCII is a 7-bit encoding, ASCII characters are limited to the lowest 128 Unicode characters, from U+0000 to U+007F. 如果使用 属性或 构造函数返回的默认编码器，则在执行编码操作之前，该范围外的字符将替换为问号（？）。If you use the default encoder returned by the property or the constructor, characters outside that range are replaced with a question mark (?) before the encoding operation is performed. 由于 类仅支持有限字符集，因此 、和 类更适用于全球化应用程序。Because the class supports only a limited character set, the , , and classes are better suited for globalized applications. 以下注意事项可帮助您决定是否使用 ：The following considerations can help you to decide whether to use : - 某些协议需要 ASCII 或 ASCII 的子集。Some protocols require ASCII or a subset of ASCII. 在这些情况下，ASCII 编码非常合适。In these cases ASCII encoding is appropriate. - 如果需要8位编码，则 ASCII 可能不是正确的选择。If an 8-bit encoding is expected, then ASCII probably isn't the correct choice. 请考虑使用 UTF8 而不是 ASCII。Instead, consider using UTF8 instead of ASCII. 对于 U + 0000 到 U + 007F 的字符，结果是相同的，但所有 Unicode 字符都以 UTF-8 表示，这可避免数据丢失。For the characters U+0000 through U+007F, the results are identical, but all Unicode characters are representable in UTF-8, which avoids data loss. > [!CAUTION] > 不提供错误检测。 does not provide error detection. 出于安全原因，应使用 、或 并启用错误检测。For security reasons, you should use , , or and enable error detection. 方法确定导致对一组 Unicode 字符进行编码的字节数，并且 方法执行实际编码。The method determines how many bytes result in encoding a set of Unicode characters, and the method performs the actual encoding. 同样， 方法决定了多少个字符会导致对一个字节序列进行解码，而 和 方法执行实际解码。Likewise, the method determines how many characters result in decoding a sequence of bytes, and the and methods perform the actual decoding. 请注意，默认的 构造函数可能不会为应用程序提供适当的行为。Note that the default constructor by itself might not have the appropriate behavior for your application. 你可能需要考虑将 或 属性设置为 或 ，以防止设置第8位的序列。You might want to consider setting the or property to or to prevent sequences with the 8th bit set. 自定义行为也可能适用于这种情况。Custom behavior might also be appropriate for these cases. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将 Unicode 字符编码为 ASCII。The following example demonstrates how to encode Unicode characters into ASCII. 请注意，当应用程序使用 对 ASCII 范围外的 Unicode 字符进行编码时，会丢失数据。Notice the loss of data that occurs when your application uses to encode Unicode characters outside of the ASCII range. [!code-cpp[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding Example/CPP/snippet.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding Example/CS/snippet.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding Example/VB/snippet.vb#1)]

span.span: Understanding Encodings

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 类不提供错误检测。The class does not provide error detection. 出于安全原因，应使用 、或 类并启用错误检测。For security reasons, you should use the , , or class and enable error detection. 如果选择使用 ASCII 编码，此构造函数可能不会为你的应用程序提供适当的回退行为。If you choose to use ASCII encoding, this constructor may not provide the appropriate fallback behavior for your application. 它使用 和 类将 U + 0000 到 U + 007F 范围之外的每个字符替换为问号（？）。It uses the and classes to replace every character outside the range of U+0000 through U+007F with a question mark (?). 相反，你可以调用 或 方法并向其传递 和 对象，以使用异常回退。Instead, you can call the or method and pass it and objects to use exception fallback. > [!NOTE] > 仅支持 U + 0000 和 U + 007F 之间的 Unicode 字符值。 supports only the Unicode character values between U+0000 and U+007F. 因此，、和 更适用于全球化应用程序。Therefore, , , and are better suited for globalized applications. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建新的 实例并显示编码的名称。The following example demonstrates how to create a new instance and display the name of the encoding. [!code-cpp[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.ctor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding.ctor Example/CPP/ctor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.ctor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding.ctor Example/CS/ctor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.ctor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding.ctor Example/VB/ctor.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要计算 存储生成的字节所需的准确大小，请使用 。To calculate the exact size required by to store the resulting bytes, use . 若要计算最大大小，请使用 。To calculate the maximum size, use . 方法通常允许分配较少的内存，而 方法的执行速度通常更快。The method generally allows allocation of less memory, while the method generally executes faster.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要计算 存储生成的字节所需的准确大小，请使用 。To calculate the exact size required by to store the resulting bytes, use . 若要计算最大大小，请使用 。To calculate the maximum size, use . 方法通常允许分配较少的内存，而 方法的执行速度通常更快。The method generally allows allocation of less memory, while the method generally executes faster. 要转换的数据（如从流中读取的数据）只能在顺序块中使用。Data to be converted, such as data read from a stream, can be available only in sequential blocks. 在这种情况下，或者如果数据量很大以致需要分为较小块，请分别使用 方法或 方法提供的 或 。In this case, or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, use the or the provided by the method or the method, respectively. 不提供错误检测。 does not provide error detection. 大于 `U+007F` 的任何 Unicode 字符都编码为 ASCII 问号（"？"）。Any Unicode character greater than `U+007F` is encoded as the ASCII question mark ("?"). > [!CAUTION] > 出于安全原因，应使用 、或 并启用错误检测。For security reasons, you should use , , or and enable error detection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要计算 存储生成的字节所需的确切数组大小，应用程序需使用 。To calculate the exact array size required by to store the resulting bytes, the application uses . 若要计算最大数组大小，应用程序应使用 。To calculate the maximum array size, the application should use . 方法通常允许分配较少的内存，而 方法的执行速度通常更快。The method generally allows allocation of less memory, while the method generally executes faster. 要转换的数据（如从流中读取的数据）只能在顺序块中使用。Data to be converted, such as data read from a stream, can be available only in sequential blocks. 在这种情况下，或者如果数据量很大以致需要分为较小的块，则应用程序应分别使用 方法或 方法提供的 或 。In this case, or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, the application should use the or the provided by the method or the method, respectively. 不提供错误检测。 does not provide error detection. 大于 U + 007F 的任何 Unicode 字符都编码为 ASCII 问号（"？"）。Any Unicode character greater than U+007F is encoded as the ASCII question mark ("?"). > [!CAUTION] > 出于安全原因，建议应用程序使用 、或 并启用错误检测。For security reasons, your application is recommended to use , , or and enable error detection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法对 Unicode 字符数组中的一系列元素进行编码，并将已编码的字节存储在字节数组中的一系列元素中。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to encode a range of elements from a Unicode character array and store the encoded bytes in a range of elements in a byte array. summary.span: 获取可以将 ASCII 编码的字节序列转换为 Unicode 字符序列的解码器。

span.span: Obtains a decoder that converts an ASCII encoded sequence of bytes into a sequence of Unicode characters.

returns.span: 用于将 ASCII 编码的字节序列转换为 Unicode 字符序列。

span.span: A that converts an ASCII encoded sequence of bytes into a sequence of Unicode characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法以类似于此类的 方法的方式将连续字节块转换为连续的字符块。The method converts sequential blocks of bytes into sequential blocks of characters, in a manner similar to the method of this class. 但 会在调用之间维护状态信息，因此它可以正确地对跨块的字节序列进行解码。However, a maintains state information between calls so it can correctly decode byte sequences that span blocks. 还将保留数据块末尾的尾随字节，并在下一个解码操作中使用尾随字节。The also preserves trailing bytes at the end of data blocks and uses the trailing bytes in the next decoding operation. 因此， 和 对于网络传输和文件操作非常有用，因为这些操作经常处理数据块，而不是完整的数据流。Therefore, and are useful for network transmission and file operations, because those operations often deal with blocks of data instead of a complete data stream.

span.span: Understanding Encodings

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Text.Encoder GetEncoder ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Text.Encoder GetEncoder() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetEncoder () As Encoder
public: override System::Text::Encoder ^ GetEncoder();
override this.GetEncoder : unit -> System.Text.Encoder

summary.span: 获取可将 Unicode 字符序列转换为 ASCII 编码的字节序列的编码器。

span.span: Obtains an encoder that converts a sequence of Unicode characters into an ASCII encoded sequence of bytes.

returns.span: 一个 ，它将一个 Unicode 字符序列转换为一个 ASCII 编码的字节序列。

span.span: An that converts a sequence of Unicode characters into an ASCII encoded sequence of bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法以类似于此类的 方法的方式将顺序块字符转换为按顺序排列的字节块。The method converts sequential blocks of characters into sequential blocks of bytes, in a manner similar to the method of this class. 但 会在调用之间维护状态信息，因此它可以正确地对跨块的字符序列进行编码。However, an maintains state information between calls so it can correctly encode character sequences that span blocks. 还在数据块的末尾保留尾部字符，并在下一编码操作中使用尾随字符。The also preserves trailing characters at the end of data blocks and uses the trailing characters in the next encoding operation. 例如，数据块可能以不匹配的高代理项结束，并且匹配的低代理项可能位于下一个数据块中。For example, a data block might end with an unmatched high surrogate, and the matching low surrogate might be in the next data block. 因此， 和 对于网络传输和文件操作非常有用，因为这些操作经常处理数据块，而不是完整的数据流。Therefore, and are useful for network transmission and file operations, because those operations often deal with blocks of data instead of a complete data stream.

span.span: Understanding Encodings

span.span: The number of characters to encode.

span.span: Calculates the maximum number of bytes produced by encoding the specified number of characters.

returns.span: 对指定数目的字符进行编码所产生的最大字节数。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes produced by encoding the specified number of characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法计算 方法存储生成的字节所需的精确数组大小，而 方法则计算最大数组大小。The method calculates the exact array size required by the method to store the resulting bytes, whereas the method calculates the maximum array size. 方法通常分配较少的内存，但 方法的执行速度通常更快。The method generally allocates less memory, but the method generally executes faster. 是最差的事例数，包括当前所选 的最坏情况。 is a worst-case number, including the worst case for the currently selected . 如果你选择的替换回退具有可能大的字符串，则 可以返回大值。If you choose a replacement fallback with a potentially large string, can return large values. 方法会考虑先前编码操作中的潜在遗留代理项。The method considers potential leftover surrogates from a previous encoding operation. 因此，如果 对象使用默认的替换回退，或者如果使用单个可能的回退字符定义了自定义的替换回退，则该方法将返回 `charCount` + 1。As a result, if the object uses the default replacement fallback, or if a custom replacement fallback has been defined with a single possible fallback character, the method returns `charCount` + 1. 如果 对象使用具有多个可能的回退字符的替换回退，则该方法将返回*n* \* （`charCount` + 1），其中*n*是最大回退字符数。If the object uses a replacement fallback with more than one possible fallback character, the method returns *n* \* (`charCount` + 1), where *n* is the maximum number of fallback characters. 与 无关。 has no relation to . 如果你的应用程序需要类似的函数来与 一起使用，则它应使用 。If your application needs a similar function to use with , it should use . > [!NOTE] > `GetMaxByteCount(N)` 不一定与 `N* GetMaxByteCount(1)`相同。`GetMaxByteCount(N)` is not necessarily the same value as `N* GetMaxByteCount(1)`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法来计算对指定数目的字符进行编码所需的字节数。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to calculate the bytes required to encode a specified number of characters. [!code-cpp[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetMaxByteCount Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetMaxByteCount Example/CPP/getmaxbytecount-int32.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetMaxByteCount Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetMaxByteCount Example/CS/getmaxbytecount-int32.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetMaxByteCount Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetMaxByteCount Example/VB/getmaxbytecount-int32.vb#1)]

span.span: is less than zero.
-or-

span.span: The resulting number of bytes is greater than the maximum number that can be returned as an integer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法计算 方法存储所生成的字符所需的精确数组大小，而 方法则计算最大数组大小。The method calculates the exact array size required by the method to store the resulting characters, whereas the method calculates the maximum array size. 方法通常分配较少的内存，而 方法的执行速度通常更快。The method generally allocates less memory, while the method generally executes faster. 检索最差的事例数，包括当前所选 的最坏情况。 retrieves a worst-case number, including the worst case for the currently selected . 如果存在最大回退长度为*n*的解码器回退，则 方法返回*n* \* `byteCount`。If a decoder fallback is present that has a maximum fallback length of *n*, the method returns *n* \* `byteCount`. 与 无关。 has no relation to . 如果你的应用程序需要类似的函数来与 一起使用，则它应使用 。If your application needs a similar function to use with , it should use . > [!NOTE] > `GetMaxCharCount(N)` 不一定与 `N* GetMaxCharCount(1)`相同。`GetMaxCharCount(N)` is not necessarily the same value as `N* GetMaxCharCount(1)`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法来计算对指定字节数进行解码所需的最大字符数。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to calculate the maximum number of characters needed to decode a specified number of bytes. remarks.format: ## Remarks 要转换的数据（如从流中读取的数据）只能在顺序块中使用。Data to be converted, such as data read from a stream, can be available only in sequential blocks. 在这种情况下，或者如果数据量很大以致需要分为较小的块，则应用程序应分别使用 方法或 方法提供的 或 。In this case, or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, the application should use the or the provided by the method or the method, respectively. 不提供错误检测。 does not provide error detection. 任何大于十六进制0x7F 的字节都将解码为 Unicode 问号（"？"）。Any byte greater than hexadecimal 0x7F is decoded as the Unicode question mark ("?"). > [!CAUTION] > 出于安全原因，应使用 、或 类，并启用错误检测，而不是使用 类。For security reasons, you should use the , , or classes and enable error detection instead of using the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法将字节数组转换为 。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to convert a byte array into a . [!code-cpp[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetString1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetString1 Example/CPP/getstring-byte[].cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetString1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetString1 Example/CS/getstring-byte[].cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetString1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetString1 Example/VB/getstring-byte[].vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不要使用 属性来确定用于编码操作的字节数组的大小以及用于解码操作的字符数组大小（例如，使字节数组的大小 \* 要编码的字符数），应为编码操作调用 或 方法，并为解码操作调用 或 方法。Instead of using the property to determine the size of a byte array for encoding operations and the size of a character array for decoding operations (for example, so that the size of the byte array is \* the number of characters to be encoded), you should call the or method for encoding operations and the or method for decoding operations. 在计算所需的数组大小时，这些方法会考虑 对象的替换回退策略。These methods takes the object's replacement fallback strategy into account when calculating the required array size.
